official_title: To extend the statute of limitations on tort actions brought by the Resolution Trust Corporation.
short_title: Resolution Trust Corporation Asset Recovery Act of 1992

summary.text: Resolution Trust Corporation Asset Recovery Act of 1992 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to extend from three years to five years the statute of limitations for tort actions brought by the Resolution Trust Corporation in its capacity as conservator or receiver of failed savings associations.

titles.title: Resolution Trust Corporation Asset Recovery Act of 1992
To extend the statute of limitations on tort actions brought by the Resolution Trust Corporation.
